name: Don't Cut Your Hand 2
description:
You become a chef, working for a nonsense restaurant. Your job is to satisfy customers' appetite as quickly as possible.

Be careful! Be careful when holding the knife! Be careful when holding the knife! Be careful when holding the knife! Because it is important, say it three times!!


More than a unexpected customers will come to your store.

More than 30 menus.
Different menus use different cooking utensils, pay attention to the processing time of the utensils, deliver the dishes as quickly as possible to customers to get more points, and continue to challenge your highest score!
You saw a UFO on your table? Then you must be dazzled.

Support local/online co-op challenges, invite friends to play as the other hand! But be careful the knife in your friend's hand.
